author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Remove unneeded caching of shapes and volumes in the namespace containers
* Name the shapes in their constructor

@bsunanda - FYI, perhaps, introduced changes are applicable to other algorithms.

title: DD4hep: Cleanup HCal Barrel Algorithm
